Rulings.Base:
1. Removing 1 card in your Deck from play starts a Chain.
2. The card is removed from play face-up.
3. If "Watthydra" attacks twice and inflicts Battle Damage twice, its effect activates twice.
4. Adding the removed card to your hand does not start a Chain.
5. Even if "Watthydra" is no longer on the field during your 2nd Standby Phase after activating the effect, you still add the removed from play card to your hand.
6. You still add the removed card to your hand even if the effect of "Watthydra" is being negated during your 2nd Standby Phase.

PSCT.Base:
1 "Watt" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Thunder-Type monsters
This card can attack your opponent directly. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent by a direct attack, choose 1 card in your Deck and remove it from play. Add that card to your hand during your 2nd Standby Phase after activating this effect.
